title: Chapter 1569 - The Death Of Wen Jue
body:
Chapter 1569 - The Death Of Wen Jue

The Cave of Trials, the eighth floor.

Xue Hongfeng sat on the ground, meditating. He was dressed in black, with cold, steely features. He was from an Immortal Lord clan, and his aptitude was extraordinary, especially for the Dao of the Saber. Yet… he’d failed to overcome the eighth trial twice in a row.

Xue Hongfeng gnashed his teeth. “Next time, I’ll win for sure!”

Suddenly, the golden Dao stele to the side of the hall drew his attention. A rain of light scattered as a new ranker appeared: three hundred and ninety-third place.

This rank wasn’t high, but it absolutely wasn’t low, either. After all, despite the passage of countless years, only a select handful of Universe Realm Immortals had ever overcome the trials of the eighth floor.

“He’s just one rank below me!” exclaimed Xue Hongfeng. After overcoming the seventh floor, his results put him in three hundred and ninety-second place!

A moment later, he saw the new arrival.

He was a young man in blue, tall and upright, with the air of one who’d risen out of the dust of mortality. Most importantly, he showed absolutely no sign of...
original_title: Chapter 1569 - The Death of Wen Jue
